short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit addictive and distracting behaviours of webpages like YouTube, Twitter and others, and enjoy what really matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JOMO is a browser extension that let's you modify how websites work, removing their addictive behaviours. It's 100% free and opensource.
